llmlingua_promptflow.tools.llmlingua.pro.name: LLMLingua Prompt Compression Tool
llmlingua_promptflow.tools.llmlingua.pro.description: To speed up LLMs' inference and enhance LLM's perceive of key information, compress the prompt and KV-Cache, which achieves up to 20x compression with minimal performance loss.

promptflow.tools.open_model_llm.OpenMode.name: Open Model LLM
promptflow.tools.open_model_llm.OpenMode.description: Use an open model from the Azure Model catalog, deployed to an AzureML Online Endpoint for LLM Chat or Completion API calls.

promptflow_vectordb.tool.common_index_lo.name: Index Lookup
promptflow_vectordb.tool.common_index_lo.description: Search an AzureML Vector Index for relevant results using one or more text queries.
